lead_paragraph: A chart last Sunday with an article about the paucity of left-handed catchers in major league baseball history erroneously included two players on a list of those who have played at least one game since 1900. Although pitcher Chris Short and first baseman Tom Chism were penciled in as catchers, they were replaced in the lineup before playing the position.
